korean: 오늘 회사에서 제공하는 온라인 교육을 들었다.
팀장님이 전체 팀원한테 듣는 걸 추천하셔서 신청했어.
새로운 협업 툴 사용법에 대한 강의였는데 유용했다.
처음엔 복잡해 보였는데 설명 들으니까 생각보다 간단하더라.
실습도 있어서 직접 따라 해보니까 이해가 잘 됐다.
중간에 모르는 거 있어서 질문했는데 강사분이 바로 답변해주셨어.
다른 참가자들이랑 채팅으로 얘기도 나누면서 들었다.
회사에서 이런 교육 기회를 많이 제공해줘서 좋다.
배운 거 바로 업무에 적용해보니까 확실히 편하더라.
다음에 또 다른 교육 있으면 신청해야겠어.
계속 배우면서 성장하는 게 중요한 것 같아.
english: I took an online training course offered by the company today.
My team leader recommended it to the whole team, so I signed up.
It was about how to use a new collaboration tool, and it was really useful.
At first it looked complicated, but after hearing the explanation, it was actually simpler than I thought.
There were hands-on exercises, so trying it myself helped me understand better.
I had some questions in the middle and the instructor answered them right away.
I also chatted with other participants during the session.
I got a certificate after completing the training.
I'm glad the company provides these learning opportunities.
I tried using what I learned at work right away and it was definitely more convenient.
If there's another training session, I should sign up again.
I think it's important to keep learning and growing.
